name: Dull&Han
description:
Dull, the animated armor, & Han, the flaming skull, are lost in another dark and void dungeon and they aren't competent enough by themselves. Can you help Dull & Han to escape this dark place?

Controls

  • Move - A/D or J/L
  • Jump - Space
  • Pick things up - B or Z
  • Drop things - N or X
  • Enter Doors -  W or I
  • Restart level - R
  • Adjust Volume - T

Made in less than 48 hours for the GMTK game jam 2021 by Fniss. Built in Unity, Pyxel, and SFXR.
